None.Name: Essence Bolt
None.Description: Every 10 seconds, tower fires a magic bolt that deals 275 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 410 in total. Knocks back small units.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 5 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks.

en.Description:
Essence Bolt: +20 damage per target, 30 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Essence Bolt: +36 damage per target, 54 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Essence Bolt: +44 damage per target, 66 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

ru.Description:
Essence Bolt: +20 damage per target, 30 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Essence Bolt: +36 damage per target, 54 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Essence Bolt: +44 damage per target, 66 in total
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Extra.en: Without a root network,  Living Tower attacks once every 11 seconds. With one unit (buildings do not count) in the root network,  this decreases by 45%,  down to 6s. With another unit added,  it decreases by 22.5% (half as much as previously),  to 4.65s. This goes on through -11.25% (4.16s),  5.63% (3.93s),  2.81% (3.82s),  and finally 1.41% for a maximum attack speed of 1 attack per 3.76 seconds approximately.
